name: Flock (Owl Sanctuary Studios)
description:
A lovely little game made for the Squiggly Pride Jam 2020.  Help the other sheep come out. 

Controls: KBM or (Xbox or DS4 Controller (working rarely))

  • Left Stick / WASD to move
  • Left Bumper / Shift to sprint
  • A Button / E Key to interact (when another sheep comes up to you)
  • If keyboard inputs aren't working try going to full-screen and then exiting it
